name: places/ChIJAYTcG7ZZwokRaeEt7qC98WQ
adrFormatAddress: 224 12th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
I have been with Chelsea Storage for over 20 years and have always received excellent customer service. A special “thank you” to Jairo and Shane in the office who were always so helpful and to Rob who operates the elevator at the storage facility.

Susan
NYC

originalText.text: I'm very disappointed and disturbed with storage post I had my belongings transfered from Manhattan to queens  because it was closing now in that process the people who packed up my belongings rin Manhattan ransacked my things broke religious items my unit was packed to the top in Manhattan and when I  went the other day to the one they transferred all my belongings it was sad  to open my unit half of my things are  stolen I have a few items that belongs to someone else they stole half of my things  I've made a complete complain and if I have to take legal action I  have not problem in  doing so this is very unfair the little bit i had left is gone

originalText.text:
It is a great opportunity to review
Chelsea Mini Storage now Storage Post Chelsea Mini Storage. This is a great full service storage facility. I was a customer in 2014 and it helped me to do what I needed quickly easily and fit my budget at a time when
worry about my finances was one of my biggest stressors. It helped me to connect to that which gives people the chance to do what they need, trust to help them get to the place of stability truth and acceptance. Security to do what I  needed to help family and friends and to take care of my most important goals and focus. To trust and keep focused on loving ways to help. At that time five years ago Chelsea Mini Storage provided shipping services to clients and sold moving supplies in an office space with an entrance on 12th Avenue in the same building. It helped me and other people that used this service and signed an agreement to do it trust that their possessions could be shipped from and to the facility using UPS or US Mail and will get to their desired destination safely. That boxes shipped there were held in safekeeping safely until the customer could physically come to take care of it.  My experience as a customer who had a storage unit there is that is one that helps me trust the benevolence of New York City people and helping them to do what they need to get to where they are going. Equality and self sufficiency. Sobriety. Life on life’s terms. There is a great security system in place with 24 hour camera recording and elevators with a security officers on each floor and also automatic lighted walkways. The storage specialists that I had the pleasure of working with were kind understanding customer service oriented and always available to help me during one of the most stressful and challenging times of my life. There are dollies and hand carts available and people to help that one  needs to sign in to maintain security for the customers there. There were always rules and standards enforced for protection safety and peace of mind. I recall there was a vending machine on site and a walkway that connects the storage unit facility to the space where the shipping and moving supply office was. There is access to the building amenities that at the time in August and September 2014 helped me to stay hydrated and connected to life and good. Thanks to God and by the grace of God I will always do what I can to help promote this place. I just learned that Storage Post has other locations in New York City and in SoFlo Little Havana in Miami and also in New Orleans. I definitely recommend this great storage full service company to friends and trusted people in the know

originalText.text: Had a terrible experience. Called the manager and told him I would need help moving help moving large boxes and a mini fridge because I was just a young college student. When I get there and ask for help, the MANAGER YELLS at me telling me that I'm trying to manipulate him and continues to insult me! He saw a young woman by herself and took advantage of the situation. All the other staff saw this and did not say a word. I would never return to this place and I recommend to everyone else to take their business elsewhere.

When I get there and ask for help, the MANAGER YELLS at me telling me that I'm trying to manipulate him and continues to insult me! He saw a young woman by herself and took advantage of the situation. All the other staff saw this and did not say a word. I would never return to this place and I recommend to everyone else to take their business elsewhere.

originalText.text: I highly recommend looking around before choosing Chelsea Mini Storage. My wife and I stored there for ten years until their management began to unravel. Every time we filled out the monthly auto pay forms, the paperwork would mysteriously go missing and they would hit us with hundreds of dollars of late fees. When we questioned what was going on, the manager was rude, threatening and repeatedly denied that we ever fill out the paperwork in the first place. I understand the occasional slip-up, but the pattern became clearly predatory.

text.text: I highly recommend looking around before choosing Chelsea Mini Storage. My wife and I stored there for ten years until their management began to unravel. Every time we filled out the monthly auto pay forms, the paperwork would mysteriously go missing and they would hit us with hundreds of dollars of late fees. When we questioned what was going on, the manager was rude, threatening and repeatedly denied that we ever fill out the paperwork in the first place. I understand the occasional slip-up, but the pattern became clearly predatory.
